SCTX - Script Source:
scn moXsctXtrapXfrontendX

;CONSTRUCTION NOTE: Add to Trapped Object.






;Switches


short XDisarmedXDoorX
short XTrapLevelXDoorX




Begin OnActivate

;Printtoconsole "Door Activated"		



	If ((XDisarmedXDoorX == 1) || (IsActionRef Player == 0)) 
		Activate; Not the Player or Already Disarmed\Triggered ... so use the object.
;Printtoconsole "Error Block"		
		Return
	EndIF



	IF GetSelf == moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XCallingdoor		;Door has Already referred case to Quest



		If moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XdisarmedXquestX == 1



			Set moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XCallingdoor to 0		
			Set XDisarmedXDoorX to 1
			Set moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XdisarmedXquestX to 0	
;Printtoconsole "Disarm Confirmed from Quest"				
			Activate Player 0
			Return		

		ElseIF moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XdisarmedXquestX != 1

;Printtoconsole "Disarm NOT Confirmed from Quest"
			Set moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XActionType to 3
			PrintToConsole "DoorDEBUG: Current Multiplier is %.2f Assign Check is %.2f (1 is TRUE 0 is FALSE)", moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeMULTI, moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned
			PrintToConsole "DoorDEBUG: Trap Level is %.2f", XTrapLevelXDoorX
			PrintToConsole "DoorDEBUG: Highest Detectable Trap is %.2f Highest Disarmable Trap is %.2f Break Chance is %.2f ", moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhighestdetectabletrap, moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhighestdisarmabletrap, moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXprobebreakchance 
			Return

		Else
;Printtoconsole "Error: Quest Read FAILED"
			Return

;Printtoconsole "Error PAss 2"					
		EndIF		
	EndIF



	IF (GetSelf != moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XCallingdoor)
;Printtoconsole "Error PAss 3"					
;Set moXqstXtrapXwritedynamicdata.XFullDynamicUpdate to 1	

		IF XDisarmedXDoorX == 0 
;Printtoconsole "Error PAss 4"	

			Set XTrapLevelXDoorX to Rand 0 130				; Assign a random level of complexity to the trap. More Complex Traps are harder to detect and disarm.

			PrintToConsole "DoorDEBUG: Trap Assigned, Level is %.2f", XTrapLevelXDoorX  			
			PrintToConsole "DoorDEBUG: Highest Detectable Trap is %.2f Highest Disarmable Trap is %.2f Break Chance is %.2f ", moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhighestdetectabletrap, moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhighestdisarmabletrap, moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXprobebreakchance 			
			PrintToConsole "DoorDEBUG: PROBES ASSIGNED Current Multiplier is %.2f Assign Check is %.2f  (1 is TRUE 0 is FALSE)", moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XCURRENTprobeMULTI, moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XProbeAssigned	





			If moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhighestdetectabletrap >= XTrapLevelXDoorX 
;Printtoconsole "Error PAss 5"	
;Printtoconsole "Input Request Sent from Door" 

				Set moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XCallingdoor to GetSelf
				Set moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XTrapLevelXquestX to XTrapLevelXDoorX
				Set moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XActionType to 3			;  Player's Skills are good enough to detect this Trap. So ask him what he wants to do.
				Return

			ElseIf moXqstXtrapXmeomorystorage.XPCXhighestdetectabletrap < XTrapLevelXDoorX
;Printtoconsole "Error PAss 6"	
;Printtoconsole "TRIGGER TRAP Request Sent from Door"

				Set moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XCallingdoor to GetSelf
				Set moXqstXtrapXcasterX.XActionType to 1			;  Player's Skills are not good enough to detect this Trap. So surprise him.:p

				Return

			ENDIF

		EndIF

	EndIF

End


;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
